properties.areaDesc: Vermillion, IN; Warren, IN; Fountain, IN; Tippecanoe, IN; Parke, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 10:12AM EST until January 2 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...Wabash River...White River...

.Precipitation on Sunday and Monday have led to minor flooding conditions
along some points of the East Fork White...White...and Wabash Rivers.
Significant flooding is not expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Lafayette.
* from this afternoon to Thursday morning.
* At  9:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 10.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to
rise to near 11.8 feet by Wednesday morning.  It will fall below
flood stage by Wednesday evening.
* At 12.0 feet...High water affects a few low river cabins and county
roads.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
